mobile.name: maid
mobile.long_description: The Maid is waiting for your order.
mobile.description: She is very beautiful with golden hair, and deep blue eyes. A good reason for coming here more often, you think to yourself.

mobile.name: sexton
mobile.long_description: A Sexton is sitting here, drinking hot tea.
mobile.description: The Sexton looks like he is relaxing after another gravedigging job.

mobile.name: chief guard
mobile.long_description: The Chief Guard is looking very upset.

mobile.name: cityguard guard
mobile.long_description: A cityguard stands here, looking very upset.

mobile.name: secretary
mobile.long_description: A secretary is sitting at the desk, typing away on the typewriter.
mobile.description:
She looks very busy.
The Secretary says 'Sorry, but the Mayor is extremely busy today.' The Secretary says 'Please sit down and have a seat in the meantime.'

mobile.name: mayor
mobile.long_description: The Mayor is sitting in his huge chair, snoring loudly.
mobile.description: He is a stocky, middle-aged man with thin, grey hair.

mobile.name: crier
mobile.long_description: The Town Crier is here, weeping quietly.
mobile.description: He is very good at his job - completely dissolved in tears.

mobile.name: swan
mobile.long_description: A swan is swimming around in the pond.
mobile.description: The white swan is very elegant.

mobile.name: duckling
mobile.long_description: A duckling is swimming around in the pond.
mobile.description: The duckling is adorable, it looks most of all like a tiny furball.

mobile.name: sparrow
mobile.long_description: A sparrow is flapping around on the ground.
mobile.description: The sparrow looks like it is enjoying life.

mobile.name: duck
mobile.long_description: A duck is here, quacking happily.
mobile.description: The duck is quite fat. It looks like it is enjoying life.
